title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow an above-the-line deduction against individual income tax for interest on indebtedness and for State sales and excise taxes with respect to the purchase of certain motor vehicles.
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individual taxpayers a deduction from gross income for: (1) interest paid on indebtedness incurred after November 12, 2008, and before January 1, 2010, for the purchase of a motor vehicle with a gross vehicle weight rating of not more than 8,500 pounds. And (2) state and local sales and excise taxes imposed on the purchase of such a motor vehicle.
